items.name: Circle of Fear
implicitMods: 6% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
explicitMods: 69% increased Cold Damage while affected by Herald of Ice
Herald of Ice has 59% increased Buff Effect
flavourText: My subordinates circled me eternally, attuned to the slightest weakness,
ready to tear me apart for their own gains.

items.name: Prism Guardian
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Socketed Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency
flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention

Suppressed Spell Damage dealt to you is Unlucky
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies additional chance to evade attacks, and makes suppressed spell damage unlucky against you.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Ice Spear Gems
Items and Gems have 15% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."

items.name: Shavronne's Wrappings
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
explicitMods: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield
flavourText: Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 44% reduced Mana Cost

Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills

Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.

And it will embrace you back.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.

Projectiles continuously lose Damage, up to 50% less Damage by the time they dissipate

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. Each pulse applies a debuff to nearby enemies for a secondary duration which reduces life and energy shield regeneration rate, and also inflicts Cold Exposure. socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.

Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Minions have 10% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
